com.sss.safesecure

Class SQLiteDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.sss.safesecure.SQLiteDBHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SQLiteDBHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Purpose: Helper class for SQLite DB transactions - this class wil hold all methods for - creating, reading, updating and deleting.
